summary: This is an email chain from July 7, 2019, within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS), announcing the arrest of Jeffrey Epstein on sex trafficking charges. It congratulates the prosecution team and notes the upcoming arraignment and press conference.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Arrested on sex trafficking charges; the email announces his arrest and upcoming arraignment.

events.title: Arrest of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested on sex trafficking charges and taken into custody.

events.title: Arraignment and Indictment Unsealing
events.description: Epstein is scheduled to be presented, arraigned, and have the indictment against him unsealed.

events.title: Press Conference Announcing Charges
events.description: A press conference is scheduled for Monday morning at 11 AM to formally announce the charges against Epstein.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested on July 6, 2019, on federal sex trafficking charges.
The indictment, to be unsealed on July 8, 2019, involves victims as young as 14 years old.
The prosecution is described as 'incredibly important' and targets a powerful individual for grievous crimes.
The email congratulates the prosecution team within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York for their work on the case.
